Package org.drip.param.product

Class Summary
BondCFTerminationEvent This class contains the current "liveness" state of the bond, and, if inactive, how it entered that state.
BondCouponParams Contains the coupon type, schedule, and the coupon amount for the bond.
BondCurrencyParams This class contains the bond's trade, the coupon, and the redemption currencies.
BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams This is the place-holder for the generic bond’s period generation parameters.
BondFloaterParams Contains the bond's floating rate parameters.
BondIdentifierParams This class contains the bond's identifier parameters - ISIN, CUSIP, ID, and ticker.
BondIRValuationParams Contains the bond IR Valuation Parameters.
BondNotionalParams This class contains the notional schedule and the amount.
BondPeriodGenerationParams Class the generates the bond coupon periods from flexible inputs
BondTSYParams Class contains bond treasury benchmark parameters - the treasury benchmark set, and the names of the treasury and the EDF IR curves.
CompCRValParams CompCRValParams contains the credit related valuation parameters - use default pay lag, use curve or the component recovery, component recovery, credit curve name, and whether there is accrual on default
CurrencyPair CurrencyPair class contains the numerator currency, the denominator currency, the quote currency, and the PIP Factor
EmbeddedOptionSchedule This class is a place holder for the embedded option schedule for the bond.
FactorSchedule Contains array of dates and factors
TsyBmkSet Contains the treasury benchmark set - the primary treasury benchmark, and an array of secondary treasury benchmarks
